name: Medium Voltage Switchgear (MV)
shortDescription: Manages, switches, and safeguards medium-voltage electrical networks for reliable power distribution.

specifications.protectionDevices: Vacuum circuit breakers (VCB), relays, CTs, PTs

applications: Primary and secondary distribution in industrial plants
Utility substations and grid distribution networks
Commercial & residential building power distribution
Oil & gas, mining, water treatment, and infrastructure projects
Feeder, transformer, and capacitor bank switching

name: Low Voltage Switchgear (LV)
shortDescription: Protects and controls low-voltage electrical circuits in power distribution systems.

specifications.busbarSystem: Copper or aluminum, fully insulated or sleeved
specifications.components: ACBs, MCCBs, MCBs, contactors, relays, metering & protection devices

applications: Main distribution in commercial & industrial facilities
Power distribution for factories, buildings, data centers, hospitals, and utilities
Feeder and sub-feeder control for equipment and lighting loads
Integration with generators, UPS systems, and automation networks
compliance: IEC 60947 series – Protection, switching & control devices

name: Motor Control Center (MCC)
shortDescription: Centralized unit for controlling, protecting, and monitoring multiple electric motors.

specifications.components: Starters (DOL, Star–Delta, Soft Starters), VFDs, MCCBs, contactors, overload relays

applications: Industrial motor control (pumps, fans, compressors, conveyors)
Manufacturing plants, HVAC systems, utilities, and water treatment facilities
Process plants: food, chemical, petrochemical, cement, steel
Centralized motor protection, monitoring, and power distribution
compliance: IEC 60947 series – Motor control & protection components

name: Power Factor Improvement Plant (PFI)
shortDescription: Enhances system efficiency by correcting power factor using capacitor banks.

specifications.switchingType: Automatic via contactors or thyristor switching (TSC)
specifications.protection: MCCBs, MCBs, fuses, thermal protection, discharge resistors

applications: Industrial plants with inductive loads (motors, welders, compressors)
Commercial buildings to reduce utility penalties
Distribution networks requiring improved power quality
HVAC, pumping stations, textile, steel, cement, and manufacturing facilities
compliance: IEEE 519 – Harmonic limits (related to detuned PFI systems)

name: Synchronizing Panel
shortDescription: Enables safe synchronization and load sharing between multiple generators or power sources.

specifications.ratedVoltage: 415 V AC (LV) or as per system requirement
specifications.controlFeatures: Phase sequence detection, voltage & frequency matching, load sharing, breaker interlocking
specifications.protectionFeatures: Overvoltage, undervoltage, overcurrent, reverse power, and out-of-phase protection

applications: Parallel operation of multiple generators
Synchronization of generator with utility/grid supply
Load sharing in power plants, industries, hospitals, and critical facilities
Integration with ATS/AMF panels for uninterrupted power supply
compliance: IEEE 1547 – Interconnection and synchronization of distributed resources

name: PLC Control Industrial Panel
shortDescription: Automates and controls industrial processes using programmable logic controllers.

specifications.plcType: Modular or compact, suitable for industrial automation
specifications.ioModules: Digital, analog, and special function modules
specifications.displayHmi: Touchscreen or operator panel for monitoring and control
specifications.protection: MCBs, fuses, surge protection, isolation relays

applications: Automation of industrial processes: assembly lines, packaging, material handling
Monitoring and control of motors, pumps, conveyors, and HVAC systems
Integration with SCADA, DCS, and industrial IoT systems
Process industries: chemical, pharmaceutical, food & beverage, textile, and steel
compliance: IEC 61131-2 – PLC hardware requirements and programming standards
IEC 61439-1/2 – Low-voltage switchgear and control panels

name: ATS / AMF Panel
shortDescription: Automatically switches between mains and generator supply to ensure uninterrupted power.

specifications.controlFeatures: Engine start/stop, mains failure detection, load transfer, fault alarm
specifications.protectionFeatures: Overvoltage, undervoltage, overcurrent, short circuit, phase failure
specifications.communication: Optional integration with PLC or SCADA

applications: Backup power management for industries, commercial buildings, and hospitals
Automatic transfer between mains and generator supply
Ensuring uninterrupted power for critical systems and processes
Integration with diesel, gas, or hybrid generators
compliance: IEC 61439-1/2 – Low-voltage switchgear and controlgear assemblies

name: Power & Lighting Distribution Boards
shortDescription: Distribute and control electrical power for lighting and utility circuits.

specifications.outgoingProtection: MCBs, MCCBs, or RCBOs for feeders
specifications.accessories: Metering, indication lamps, surge protection, earthing

applications: Distribution of electrical power to lighting and utility loads in commercial, industrial, and residential buildings
Centralized control of lighting circuits and sub-feeders
Integration with generator, UPS, and renewable energy sources
Power management for offices, factories, hospitals, and data centers

name: Cable Tray & Cable Ladder
shortDescription: Provide structured pathways for supporting and routing electrical cables.

specifications.material: Hot-dip galvanized steel, stainless steel, aluminum, or FRP
specifications.loadRating: Light, medium, or heavy-duty (as per IEC/IS standards)
specifications.types: Ladder, perforated tray, solid bottom tray, wire mesh tray
specifications.installation: Wall-mounted, floor-supported, or suspended from ceiling
specifications.accessories: Bends, tees, reducers, couplers, covers, clamps

applications: Structured routing and support of electrical cables in industrial, commercial, and infrastructure projects
Power distribution, control, and instrumentation cable management
Cable organization in plants, substations, airports, hospitals, and commercial complexes
Ensures safety, ventilation, and easy maintenance of electrical systems
compliance: IEC 61537 – Cable tray and ladder systems for electrical installations
IS 3475 / IS 8623 – Indian standards for cable trays
NEMA VE 1 – Metal cable tray standards (optional)

name: Bus Tie Duct
shortDescription: Facilitates high-capacity power transfer and interconnection between switchboards or busbar systems.

specifications.voltageRating: Up to 11 kV (typical for MV), LV versions up to 1 kV
specifications.busbarMaterial: Copper or aluminum, fully insulated or bare with protection
specifications.enclosure: Sheet metal or modular duct, floor/wall/suspended mounting
specifications.protection: Arc-proof design optional, with covers and barriers
specifications.configuration: Single, double, or multi-tier busbar arrangement

applications: Interconnection between switchgear panels, MCCs, or distribution boards
Transfer of high-capacity power between LV or MV panels
Power distribution in industrial plants, commercial buildings, and substations
Reduces installation complexity and ensures safe, organized busbar routing
compliance: IEC 61439-1/2 – Low-voltage switchgear and controlgear assemblies
